title: [Bug]: Possibility to open multiple windows at the same time
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

When teams for linux is running, I am not able to open more than one window of the application.

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

1.12.7

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
On ubuntu 24.04:

1. Open teams for linux
2. Right click on the icon of the application in the task bar
3. Click on "New Window": nothing happens
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
A new window opens.
```

### Debug

```markdown

```

### Additional context

I think this is crucial for people that work in several organizations, and need to look at them at the same time (e.g. while there is a meeting in a organization, chatting in another one...).
Right now I am forced to choose which organization use on the app, and I have to use the other organizations in the browser.
I am not sure if this is just a problem of the flatpak build.
